room_title: Escape room "Tokyo Heist" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
room_description:
We are planning a heist like no other. Our target is Haruto Nakamura, one of the wealthiest company owners in the city. His recent business dealings have disrupted our operations in the black market. It’s nothing personal, but we can’t tolerate any more interferences.
Boss has selected you to handle this job, I’ll be on the line to help you through it. He wants this to be done quickly and without error. I should remind you, Boss doesn’t accept failure. If this job goes sour, it will be the end for all of us.
